author: Judith Prakash J:
casename: Wong Ser Wan v Ng Bok Eng Holdings Pte Ltd and Another (No 2)
counsel: K Shanmugam SC, Ang Cheng Hock, Leona Yuen (Allen and Gledhill) for plaintiff; Leslie Chew SC, Chan Kia Pheng, Shaun Koh (Khattar Wong and Partners) for defendants
tags-parsed: Land/Conveyance/Whether individual creditor entitled to commence action to annul sale and transfer of assets notwithstanding bankruptcy of debtor who executed alleged fraudulent conveyance/Factors to consider/Section 73B Conveyancing and Law of Property Act (Cap 61, 1994 Rev Ed)
